document_name: Decree No. 93-942 of April 26, 1993, fixing the methods of elaboration and application of the national plan and regional plans relating to the fight against calamities, their prevention and the organization of rescue.
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/TUN/1993/TUN-1993-01-01-Decree No. 93-942 of April 26, 1993, fixing the methods of elaboration and application of the national plan and regional plans relating to the fight against calamities, their prevention and the organization of rescue._a600efa8274686c787cba1a422063758.pdf
document_description: This law sets the framework to organise Tunisia's operational response to all kind of natural disasters.
